title: GDG DevFest Belgium 2015 Announced
brief: We are proud to announce the third annual GDG DevFest 2015 - the largest Google related event in Belgium. The event will be held on 3-4 October in Brussels. More will be announced soon.

title: Call for Speakers
brief: We're very excited - not just because of the inordinate amount of caffeine based products consumed - but also because our team is putting together the final missing parts to the biggest Google related event in Belgium - GDG DevFest Belgium 2015.
